title: ISic000815. Epitaph of Zoe
body:
Facsimile Images

Super lo-
cellum, u-
bi iaceo e-
go virgo
5nomi-
ne Zoe
annorum
quinquaginta
menses VI
10adiura-
te per de-
um et infero-
s: nemi-
ni lice-
15at aperir [e]
cupa-
m

Apparatus criticus

standardised text taken from Korhonen 2010: 132-3
